slide.title: Intervals (PHP 5.3)
slide.subtitle: Creating an interval
slide.example:
<?php
// full notation
$i = new DateInterval( 'P0003-01-15T06:12:30' );

// abbreviated notation
$i = new DateInterval( 'P3DT6H' );

// from a difference
$d1 = new DateTime();
$d2 = new DateTime( "2010-10-10 10:10 Europe/Amsterdam" );
$i = $d1->diff( $d2 );

// displaying the difference
echo $i->format( '%a days, %h hours, %i minutes' ), "\n";
?>
